Comments_List: Novice level Persian. I can read and write very fluently now, but I have trouble understanding spoken persian.
It's a well taught course, and I am confident in the Persian that I have learned. But it's difficult to see the where the progress is going and feedback on grades and assignments isn't great.
Yes! If you want to learn Persian, then the course is definitely designed to teach it to you. By the end, you are definitely on track with where you should be.
